snippet.title: Terratopia: March of The Demon King Trailer
snippet.description:
Terratopia: March of The Demon King is a Choose Your Own Adventure game for the Playdate with a roguelike twist.

Control Akio, adventurer princess of the small agrarian kingdom of Shuna, and do whatever it takes to protect your home from The Demon King and their encroaching forces of darkness.  Will you train with the town militia?  Or raid forgotten dungeons in search of magical artifacts?  Beseech the gods for help?  Or recruit mercenaries from the nearby port city? 

The Demon King will be here soon, and only by making the best possible use of your time will you be able to save your home.

Terratopia: March of The Demon King releases December '24.

Follow along with our progress at: https://kodiakgamesatx.itch.io/terratopiamotdk
